script: Alright, time for everyone's favorite game.
I'm going to show you a tattoo. You tell me who did it.
Three rounds. Panelists, audience — everyone plays.
hostIntro.presenterNotes: Energy: playful, competitive. Build anticipation before each reveal. Let panelists discuss and guess before revealing.

rounds.imageDescription: Hyperrealistic lion portrait — full color, incredible detail on the mane
hints: This artist is based in California
They've been featured on Ink Master
Their Instagram has over 2 million followers
rounds.revealNote: This was from a session at Black Anchor Tattoo in 2024. The client flew in from Japan specifically for this piece.

rounds.imageDescription: Delicate fine-line botanical — single needle wildflower with impossibly thin lines
hints: This artist works exclusively in single needle
They've never done a video interview
rounds.revealNote: Emily posted this as a 'healed vs fresh' comparison. The linework held perfectly after 6 months.

rounds.imageDescription: Japanese-style dragon sleeve — bold lines, traditional color palette, wind bars throughout
hints: This artist specializes in Japanese traditional
They apprenticed in Tokyo for 3 years
They're attending Villain Arts Miami this year
rounds.revealNote: Full sleeve, completed over 5 sessions. Koji says this is his favorite piece from 2025.

script: If you got all three, you know your artists.
Tag us on Instagram with your guesses — we'll shout out the best ones next week.
hostOutro.presenterNotes: Quick CTA to social. Keep the energy high heading into the next segment.

content.presenterNotes: Flow: Host intro → Round 1 (show image, get guesses, give hints one at a time, reveal) → Round 2 → Round 3 → Host outro. Play buzzer/ding sound effects on reveal. Display artist name + IG handle on reveal screen. Keep each round to ~2 minutes.

soundEffects.notes: Play when artist name is revealed
Play if panelist guesses correctly before reveal
Play on incorrect guess — keep it fun, not harsh

backgroundMusic.title: Game show underscore — royalty-free
backgroundMusic.notes: Light game-show style music under the whole segment. Fade out during guesses, swell on reveals.
